refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: vspx_variableA member of the UDT that is created for the page. This tag declares a data member for the page subclass corresponding to the containing page. The value will be preserved between consecutive postbacks. The value will be initialized to the default when the page is accessed from some other page. The attribute "persist" means to save its value to session table for inter-page usage, this can be done only when vspx:login control is included and authentication is performed.

refsect2.title: name
refsect2.para: The name of page class member

refsect2.title: type
refsect2.para: The SQL datatype to be declared as.

refsect2.title: default
refsect2.para: The default value of it. Must be scalar value only, soever specified for defaults of UDT class members.

example.title: Simple example
example.para: A page variable declaration, this will define a new member of page class and hance we can access it with self.mask in rest of VSPX code.
example.screen: <v:page name="variable_demo01" xmlns:v="http://www.openlinksw.com/vspx/"> <v:variable name="mask" type="varchar" default="null" /> <?vsp self.mask := 'test'; http (self.mask); ?> </v:page>
